Damn, near to the punch on the t215; you all are quick. I got dibs if the deal falls through, meaning this is a backup “I will take it”

Hi Brian,

Not sure if I was first or not, but please sell it to Steve S. in the event that I was first.

I actually have in my checklist "Steve S. needs a type card" (for his collection)...and I realized I actually have this McIntyre/McIntire.

If Steve S. doesn't want it at the asking price for some reason, then I'll buy it.

Cheers,
Steve
